RelatedSentence: The wife of a convicted paedophile from Worcester Park has denied meddling with the police investigation into her husband .
The wife of a convicted paedophile from Worcester Park has denied meddling with the police investigation into her husband .
Wendy Hopkins , 59 , of Church Road in Worcester Park , denies intending to pervert the course of justice by tampering with statements in September 2010 .

Wendy Hopkins , 59 , of Church Road in Worcester Park , denies intending to pervert the course of justice by tampering with statements in September 2010 .

Mobility scooter repairman Michael Hopkins , 63 , was jailed for eight and a half - years last August after a jury found him guilty of sexually and indecently assaulting children over a nine year period .

Mobility scooter repairman Michael Hopkins , 63 , was jailed for eight and a half - years last August after a jury found him guilty of sexually and indecently assaulting children over a nine year period .
Mrs Hopkins appeared at Kingston Crown Court for the start of her trial today before Judge Susan Tapping who oversaw her husband 's trial .
Prosecutor Simon Connolly said : Wendy was a very strong matriarchal figure .
She stood by her husband and supported him , as it happened , to the end .
She searched for material that would make her husband appear whiter than white including anything that would discredit his victims , he claimed .
She searched for material that would make her husband appear whiter than white including anything that would discredit his victims , he claimed .
Mrs Hopkins broke into tears and said : Lies , it 's all lies as a witness gave evidence against her .
